title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, June 28, 2020
description: In the early hours of this day in 1969, the Stonewall uprising broke out in New York City, marking the beginning of the LGBTQ rights movement.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: In the early hours of this day in 1969, the Stonewall uprising broke out in New York City, marking the beginning of the LGBTQ rights movement.
